BillyBoy999: If you are going to criticize someone for something like spelling (it bugs me too but it's petty at best), at least make sure you're correct.  "Theater" is actually the preferred spelling of that word in the US, and acceptable English anywhere. I'm sure someone as smart as you can figure out how to google if you don't want to take my word for it.   Or don't, the irony of calling someone's spelling "shitty" when your own lack of spelling knowledge is glaring makes your shitty comment good for a laugh.
